Canvas Operations When using our platform, you'll have access to a wide range of basic canvas operations that make your creative journey effortless. You can express your ideas through drawing, correct or modify them with erasing, effortlessly select and transform elements, add text to convey your message effectively, and connect various components seamlessly using connectors. These fundamental tools are designed to provide you with a versatile and intuitive canvas experience, ensuring that you can bring your vision to life with ease.

item.title: Riddey
item.description: Vision Statement At Riddey, our vision is to transform collaboration and creativity by providing a dynamic and intuitive online whiteboard experience. We aspire to be the go-to platform that empowers individuals, teams, and organizations worldwide to connect, ideate, and innovate seamlessly, transcending geographical boundaries. Through continuous innovation and user-centric design, we aim to foster a world where ideas flow effortlessly and creativity knows no limits. item.title: Why is it Hard to Draw with a Mouse and What Can You Do About It?
item.description: Why is it Hard to Draw with a Mouse and What Can You Do About It? Were you a big-time whiteboard user before the work-from-home era? And now, do you just talk and gesture in Zoom meetings instead of using an online whiteboard? If so, you are not alone—many don’t even bother because they feel it is too difficult. Have you ever wondered why? To start things off, here is a personal story some might relate to.
